Text: Please keep seeding this.  This is the kind of information that needs to get out.  The oil companies and war machine has done too much damage for too long, and Americans need to learn as the people of Brazil did that there are ways to break free of the grip of big oil and big government.  Even industrial agriculture's crushing power against the American Farmer can be defused with the information found in this video and the book.
Too bad running a still is illegal pretty much every-fucking-where on earth without a license.

It's legal in the US with a proper permit.  This video is important for people throughout the world to see because it breaks the myths about alternative fuel sources.  There are a number of things in the video that I don't agree with from a technical perspective, but the video and especially the book are excellent.

Thank you for the DVD.
CAn you ,please ,post the book in pdf format?
Thanks 
Mike
